name: Vampires: The New Birth
description:
Welcome to our story-driven, Gothic tale, Vampires: The New Birth :)

You play as our protagonist Vinette, a young woman forever dragged into the world of vampires, and struggles against the challenges of adapting to a life of immortality, constant danger, and solitude.

You will learn the seductive secrets of the human psyche, turning patrons of nightclubs into your submissive vessels of blood. You'll prey upon the unsuspecting mortals from the shadows, to satiate your endless appetite.

But most of all: you must learn to cope with what some call a gift, and many more... an unforgivable curse.
